availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jefferson Brown (AKA Jeff. Brown, Louisville/New Albany attorney)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, and New Albany, Indiana, attorney, politician, judge, and notary. Pewee Valley, Kentucky, native. Married Jane "Jennie" McMurtry Brown in Henderson County on April 22, 1856. Father of Stuart Brown. Studied law at Augusta College in Augusta, Kentucky, and with James Speed. Graduate of the University of Louisville. Member of the Democratic party. Clerk of Union County Court. Judge of the Union County Court. Representative of Union County, Kentucky, in the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1849. Attorney in Louisville and New Albany from 1858.

ab.bibl:
